DataKund - Automate Browsers without Selenium scripting
========================================================
|
| **DataKund is a powerful Record & Play tool**
| **Make robots to automate fairly complex tasks by simply recording your tasks in the browser**

| *Lets see a few examples*


**Yellow Pages Scraper run from Jupyter**

.. image:: images/yellowpages_scraper.*

**Social Media Posting Bot**

.. image:: images/post_bot.*

**Google Search Bot run from Postman**

.. image:: images/postman_google_search_bot.*

- **Automate Web Apps testing**
- Automate Repetitive tasks eg.
     - `YouTube Video Upload Bot <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/YouTube%20Video%20Uploader.html>`_
     - `Send LinkedIn Connects Bot <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/LinkedIn%20Connection%20Sending.html>`_
     - `Send WhatsApp Messages Bot <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUZ-hR-i3zY&list=PLR4kjR3gemXoRINlFxSrbB91OySE4kLH3>`_
     - `Follow Instagram Profile Bot <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Instagram%20Auto%20Follow%20Bot.html>`_
- Scrape Websites eg.
      - `Amazon Product Scraper <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Amazon%20Product%20Result%20Page%20Scraper.html>`_
      - `Google Search Results Count Scraper <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Google%20Search%20Keyword.html>`_
      

| **DataKund handles all Selenium scripting underneath**
| **Access all the Bots/APIs from within your code with a single function call**

..
	.. list-table:: Selenium vs DataKund
	   :widths: 25 20 50
	   :header-rows: 1

	   * - Features
		 - Selenium
		 - DataKund
	   * - Coding experience
		 - Required
		 - Not Required
	   * - Customer Support
		 - Open-source Community
		 - Dedicated support
	   * - API Support
		 - Cannot perform actions through apis
		 - Can call apis
	   * - Maintenance
		 - slight change in website can make the code fail
		 - don't fail with slight changes in website
	   * - Inspection of Elements
		 - Need to inspect elements to write code
		 - it records itself
	   * - Time
		 - takes time in writing code
		 - takes no time in making apis
	   * - Dependencies
		 - Depends on driver,selenium module and programming language
		 - No programming language or driver needed
	   * - Locators knowledge
		 - knowledge of locators such as id, class etc needed
		 - no such knowledge needed
